not_found.title: Oops! This page took a wrong turn...
not_found.description: It seems the page you're looking for doesn't exist. Maybe it packed its bags and left for vacation.

meta.title: FisEvents - Simplify Your Event Management
meta.description: Effortlessly publish and manage your events with FisEvents. From cooking workshops to meetings, FisEvents lets you create, share, and manage one-time events seamlessly.
meta.keywords: events, event management, workshops, meetings, online registration, FisEvents

home.payoff: Effortlessly publish and manage your events!
home.subtitle: Simplify Event Management
home.main_text: From cooking workshops to meetings, FisEvents lets you create, share, and manage one-time events seamlessly. Get started for free!

reg_link.title: Simple User Registration
reg_link.text: It's just a matter of sharing a unique link, generated automatically, with your users to register for your event with ease.

events.title: Customizable Event Details
events.text: Add a title, description, image, location, and set maximum participants, price, and currency.

date_management.title: Flexible Date Management
date_management.text: Set start and end dates for your event, decide when users can register.

start_free.title: You can use it for free!
start_free.text: Start publishing your event right away, without registering credit cards or anything else!

waiting_for_the_email.title: Check your email inbox
waiting_for_the_email.description: We will send you a "magic link" to your email. Just click it or copy it to your browser.

auth.title: You are almost there ...
auth.description: Authenticate using your email or via Google

login_with_email.title: Login with Email
login_with_email.ok_text: A magic link has been sent to you
login_with_email.err_text: Something went wrong sending the link to your email

descriptions.email: We will send you a magic link to your email

report_bug.title: Report a Bug or Suggest a Feature
report_bug.description: We would love to hear from you! Please fill in the form below to report a bug or suggest a feature.
report_bug.ok_text: Thank you for your feedback. We will get back to you soon.

descriptions.name: Your personal name and family name
descriptions.slug: This is the URL of your Organization. It will be visible in the address bar of your browser.
descriptions.www: Have you got a website or a social profile? Write it here
descriptions.logo: Upload here your company or organization logo

validation.name: Name must be at least 5 characters.
validation.companyName: Company name must be at least 5 characters.
validation.www: Write the website URL starting with http:// or https://

events.title: Event name
events.public_link: Public link: copy/paste it in your website or social media

descriptions.title: This is your event public display name.
descriptions.slug: This is the URL of your event. It will be visible in the address bar of any browser. It's generated automatically but you can change it if you want or press the button beside it.
descriptions.image: A photo or image that represents your event
descriptions.description: Give your users details about this event, e.g. who it is for, what benefits it provides, what the teaching plan is, etc.
descriptions.location: Where is the event? Include directions or a map or directions
descriptions.maxSubscribers: If it is a limited number, indicate the maximum number, otherwise let it empty
descriptions.publicationStartDate: If you want to postpone the possibility of registering for the event, otherwise let it empty and the registration is open startig from now
descriptions.public_link: Public URL, this where your users will see your event description and will be able to register to it. Copy/paste it in your website or social media

validation.title: Title must contain at least 5 characters.
validation.slug: Slug must contain at least 5 characters.
validation.publicationStartDateAndStartDate: The publication date must be before the event start date
validation.publicationStartDateAndNow: The publication date must start at least from today
validation.startDate: The start date must be before the event end date

validation.name: Name must be at least 5 characters.

descriptions.email: Your preferred email to manage your participation
descriptions.phone: Your phone number, for any last minute communications
descriptions.privacy_acceptance: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy. We collect and process your data toprovide you with our services and to keep you informed about relevant updates and information.

validation.fullName: Name must be at least 5 characters.

public.success_subscribed: You have been successfully subscribed to this event
public.unsuscribe_confirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from this event?

errors.already_subscribed: You are already subscribed to this event
